text: @julianborger @SecPompeo our country is better than your racist xenophobic rhetoric &  you embarrass & demean us.  The G7 minus you are right. It is COVID-19 which does not discriminate. You clearly are not up for the job of representing our country as Sec State as you lack ethics & diplomacy
